description: Business video made easy for all
overview:
VIDIZMO is a powerful yet simple to use interactive rich media platform for training & learning, corporate video & communication, lecture capture, product support and marketing through Live and On Demand Presentations & webinars.

VIDIZMO’s target markets are small to medium size organizations, corporates, academic institutes, healthcare organizations, non-profits and government departments. VIDIZMO is offered in both Software-as-a-Service and On-Premises models based on customer’s needs, size & budgets.

Software-as-a-Service: VIDIZMO Channels allow small & medium businesses, organizations & institutes with smaller-scale rich media needs and limited budgets to easily create, distribute and evaluate interactive rich media content in a branded portal environment. It is offered in Software-as-a-Service model with Affordable and flexible pricing plans starting from $299/mo for 50 hours of viewings/mo.

On-Premises: VIDIZMO Enterprise is a highly scalable, customizable rich media portal solution solution for large Organizations requiring a tailored solution and looking to maximize their ROI in media and learning budgets. It integrates with local CDN and existing enterprise systems like HR, CRM, Directory Services for Single Sign-on, SharePoint etc. Content can be hosted behind firewall for privacy or outside firewall for broader access.

Typical Applications: Training & Learning, Corporate Video & Communication, Workforce Development, Video LMS, Knowledge Management, Lecture Capture, Webinars, Webcasts, Grand Rounds, Content Monetization.

Feature highlights:

  • Mix videos with videos, audios, images, text captions & branch able quizzes
  • Adaptive Learning
  • Track viewing behavior
  • Add labels, comments, markers & chapters
  • Provide ability to search and jump to location within video
  • Synchronize PowerPoint, Word, PDF and other
  • Issue Certificates upon completion
  • SCORM Compliant
  • Run Campaigns for notifications
  • 508 compliance
  • Live Recording & Editing
  • Public or Private Audience
  • Paypal Integration
  • Licensing & Digital Rights Management
